name: part_006
file: tmp_【3D配信】４周年記念ミニライブ【＃ときのそら4周年】 [s7hakOSsU-I]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Tokino Sora and AZKi talk on stage about their duo performance and the difficulty of the song.
Sora and AZKi invite Hoshimachi Suisei and Tsunomaki Watame to join them on stage. They discuss performing Sora's song 'Dream Story' as a group of four.
Performance of the song 'Dream Story' by Tokino Sora, AZKi, Hoshimachi Suisei, and Tsunomaki Watame.

subtitles.original: これで、これ二人で歌いたいってなって...
subtitles.english: With this, I decided I wanted to sing this as a duo...

subtitles.original: ねえ、やっぱ難しいじゃん、やっぱこの曲って。
subtitles.english: Right? This song is really difficult, after all.

subtitles.original: ねえ、そうだよね、難しいよね。
subtitles.english: Yeah, it is, isn't it? It's difficult.

subtitles.original: 大丈夫かなって思ったら、なんか二人の声で、あ、全然大丈夫ってなって。
subtitles.english: I was worried if it'd be okay, but when I heard our voices together, I was like, "Oh, it's totally fine!"

subtitles.original: 流石！
subtitles.english: As expected!

subtitles.original: でもでも、だから、そらちゃんが歌いたいって、なんかその、そらちゃんが歌ってるところを、なんか聞いたことなかったからめっちゃ...
subtitles.english: But, but, so, when you said you wanted to sing it, Sora-chan... since I hadn't heard you singing this part before, I was really...

subtitles.original: あー、あんまり歌ってないからね。
subtitles.english: Ah, I don't sing it much, after all.

subtitles.original: めっちゃ新鮮。いいのかな、いいのかな、そんなそらちゃん見れちゃって、いいのかなって思って。
subtitles.english: It's so fresh. I was like, "Is it okay? Is it really okay for me to see Sora-chan like this?"

subtitles.original: いやいやいや、今日楽しみにしてきた。
subtitles.english: No no no, I've been looking forward to today.

subtitles.original: いや、そうなんだよ、そうなんだよ。
subtitles.english: Yeah, that's right, that's right.

subtitles.original: だからね、本当になんかこう、なんか自分がやりたいことを、みんなに叶えてもらってるからね、本当に。
subtitles.english: So really, everyone is making my wishes come true today, seriously.

subtitles.original: ねえ、今日詰め込んだね、そらちゃんの、そう、すごいね。
subtitles.english: You really packed it in today, Sora-chan. It's amazing.

subtitles.original: 今日ね、ゲストもそうだし...
subtitles.english: Today, the guests too...

subtitles.original: もう選曲もそうだし、やりたいことすごいやってるから。
subtitles.english: The setlist too. I'm doing so many things I wanted to do.

subtitles.original: まだやれてないことあるんじゃないですか？
subtitles.english: Isn't there still something you haven't done yet?

subtitles.original: あります！
subtitles.english: There is!

subtitles.original: というわけで！
subtitles.english: And so!

subtitles.original: ということで！
subtitles.english: That means!

subtitles.original: 二人来てよー！すいちゃん、わためぇ！
subtitles.english: Come on out, you two! Sui-chan, Watame!

subtitles.original: 何？この動き。
subtitles.english: What's this movement?

subtitles.original: 急に直立。
subtitles.english: Suddenly standing upright.

subtitles.original: ここ、ここ！
subtitles.english: Here, here!

subtitles.original: ここです！ここです！
subtitles.english: It's here! It's here!

subtitles.original: 立ち位置！立ち位置です、四人の立ち位置。
subtitles.english: The positions! These are our standing positions. Our positions for the four of us.

subtitles.original: すごい、って、揺れてる。めちゃくちゃ揺れてる。
subtitles.english: Wow... Wait, you're swaying. You're swaying a lot.

subtitles.original: 何やってるん？
subtitles.english: What are you doing?

subtitles.original: イエーイ！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: というわけでね、私がね、やりたいもう一つのことっていうのが、私の曲を四人で歌いたいな、みたいな。
subtitles.english: So, another thing I want to do is to sing one of my songs with the four of us.

subtitles.original: いいよ！歌おう！レッツゴー！
subtitles.english: Sure! Let's sing! Let's go!

subtitles.original: やったー！そう、なんかね、私の曲は、誰に聞いても「高い」「高い」「きつい」って言われるんですけど...
subtitles.english: Yay! Yeah, you know, no matter who I ask about my songs, they always say they're "high," "high," and "tough," but...

subtitles.original: 高い、高い、きつい！
subtitles.english: High, high, tough!

subtitles.original: でも、歌います！
subtitles.english: But we're going to sing!

subtitles.original: なんですけど、歌ってくれるということで。まあね、私の名前が、あの、曲の中に出てくる曲なので...
subtitles.english: Since they agreed to sing it with me... Well, it's a song where my name appears in the lyrics...

subtitles.original: なんと！あれじゃねえか！あれじゃねえか！
subtitles.english: What! Could it be that one?! It must be that one!

subtitles.original: ということで、みんなで歌っていきたいと思いますので、よろしくお願いします！
subtitles.english: So, we'd like to sing it all together. Here we go!

subtitles.original: それでは行きます！Dream☆Story！
subtitles.english: Here we go! Dream Story!

subtitles.original: せーの、いくよー！
subtitles.english: Ready, set, go!

subtitles.original: ふと忘れてしまいたくなる　昨日のあの記憶のピース
subtitles.english: Sometimes I want to just forget those pieces of yesterday's memories

subtitles.original: 無くしたりはできそうもないけど　上手く繋げばまた続きへ
subtitles.english: I don't think I can lose them, but if I connect them well, they'll lead to what's next

subtitles.original: でも今は関係ないんだよ　そんなことも忘れちゃうような
subtitles.english: But it doesn't matter right now. Something that'll make me forget all that...

subtitles.original: 不思議な世界にアクセル全開で　飛び込もう　It's Show Time!
subtitles.english: Let's dive into a mysterious world with full throttle! It's Show Time!

subtitles.original: でもでも急ぎ足は禁物です　急がば回ってるってくらいじゃん
subtitles.english: But, but, rushing is forbidden. It's like "haste makes waste."

subtitles.original: だからたまにはゆっくり一休みしたら
subtitles.english: So once in a while, let's take a slow break, and then...

subtitles.original: それじゃちょい早めのリズムで
subtitles.english: Then, with a slightly faster rhythm...

subtitles.original: みんな行くよー！
subtitles.english: Everyone, here we go!

subtitles.original: 止まらねぇぞー！
subtitles.english: Don't stop!

subtitles.original: 飛んでけハイ　大きく深呼吸したら僕らの　ストーリーが今　溢れ出すよ
subtitles.english: Fly high! After taking a deep breath, our story starts to overflow now

subtitles.original: もっともっと大きくね！
subtitles.english: Even bigger, bigger!

subtitles.original: 最初が肝心なんです
subtitles.english: The beginning is what's important

subtitles.original: はじめましてこんにちは　せーの！
subtitles.english: Nice to meet you, hello! One, two!

subtitles.original: ときのそらだよ！
subtitles.english: I'm Tokino Sora!

subtitles.original: 舞い踊れバイ　空遠くまで届けドキドキで
subtitles.english: Dance on by! Let the heartbeat reach far into the sky

subtitles.original: そう世界彩ってくドリームストーリー　やっぱ一秒たりとも目を離さないでほしいな
subtitles.english: Yeah, the Dream Story that colors the world. After all, I don't want you to look away for even a single second

subtitles.original: まばたきもしてらんない！
subtitles.english: You can't even blink!

subtitles.original: あーほらね最高でしょ？
subtitles.english: Ah, see? It's the best, right?

subtitles.original: イエーイ！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: 一歩進めばまた白へ　見えない力が邪魔している
subtitles.english: Take one step and it's back to white. An invisible force is getting in the way

subtitles.original: ジャンプしたりできたら良いけれど　それも愛嬌　どうぞよろしく
subtitles.english: It'd be nice if I could jump, but that's just part of my charm. Nice to meet you

subtitles.original: でも今は関係ないんだよ　心響くリズムを辿れば
subtitles.english: But it doesn't matter right now. If I follow the rhythm that resonates in my heart...

subtitles.original: 不思議な世界の続きのページで　また出会えたね　Destiny!
subtitles.english: On the next page of this mysterious world, we met again. Destiny!

subtitles.original: もしもし遅めのテンポも良いけど　今そんな場合じゃないわけじゃない
subtitles.english: Hello, hello. A slow tempo is good too, but it's not like we don't have time for that

subtitles.original: だけど大丈夫一息つけたのならば
subtitles.english: But it's okay, if you've caught your breath...

subtitles.original: さあ一二の三の合図で
subtitles.english: Now, with the signal of one, two, three!

subtitles.original: みんな行くよー！
subtitles.english: Everyone, here we go!

subtitles.original: 一二の三！
subtitles.english: One, two, three!

subtitles.original: 飛んでけハイ
subtitles.english: Fly high
